vet.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals
vet.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to check someone’s past activities, relationships etc in order to make sure that person is suitable for a particular job, especially an important one
vet.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: All candidates are carefully vetted by Central Office.
vet.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to check a report, speech etc carefully to make sure it is acceptable
vet.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: The author vets every script for the new TV series.
vet.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: to examine someone’s previous jobs and activities to find out whether they are suitable to do a job, especially one that involves dealing with secret information
vet.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: The key requirement is to vet people for the most senior posts.
After passing the selection board, candidates are vetted by one of the organization’s professionals.
